attributes.action: Fast track the Lib Dem £10,000 income tax threshold policy
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this to persuade George Osborne to fast track the Lib Dem policy to increase the income tax threshold to £10,000 in the next budget, and hence take thousands more people out of tax and put £700 back in people's pockets.

There are measures that can be taken to pay for this including the clamp down on tax avoidance and a mansion tax.

Please support this and help the Lib Dems to help the lowest paid and middle income workers in this country.
